Package grails.plugin.multitenant.core

Interface Summary
CurrentTenant Interface used to store and retrieve the current tenant
TenantResolver Class that knows how to identify a tenantId given an httpServletRequest
TenantStatusChecker Interface that checks the status of a given tenant.
 

Class Summary
BaseDomainNameTenantResolver Base class used for mapping sub-domains to tenantIds.
CurrentTenantThreadLocal Basic implementation that stores the current tenant in a threadlocal variable.
